titles.title: To confirm as authorized, valid, and enforceable certain contractual rights of water users and water users organizations under the Strawberry Valley Project, Utah.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

bill.summary: 3/1/2006--Introduced. Confirms as authorized, valid, and enforceable certain rights of water users and water users organizations under the Strawberry Valley Project, Utah, as described in existing U.S. contracts (including power rights described in the Regional Solicitor's Opinion of July 30, 1986).
